abstract: The Hewlett-Packard Pavilion HDX has a 20-inch screen and can handle HD DVD discs and HDMI video.
snippet: The Hewlett-Packard Pavilion HDX has a 20-inch screen and can handle HD DVD discs and HDMI video.
lead_paragraph: If you nickname your company’s new laptop the Dragon, it had better be impressive. The Hewlett-Packard Pavilion HDX lacks wings and scales, but it does have a 20-inch screen and can handle HD DVD discs and HDMI video.

headline.main: A Fire-Breathing Laptop Powered Up for Entertainment
headline.print_headline: A Fire-Breathing Laptop Powered Up for Entertainment
